lxpAddress.heading: Linea XP wallet address
lxpAddress.prompt: Please enter the wallet address linked to your LXP

nextSteps.heading: Thank you for installing the LXP Snap
nextSteps.body: Next, set your address with the [companion site](https://lxp-snap.linea.build/) to track your Linea XP balance. At any time you can open the Snaps menu and click on LXP to view your balance, Proof of Humanity status, and current activations.

help: LXP earned in activations may not arrive in your wallet until the activation is complete.
